content.question:
Respond to all parts of the question:

(a) Using the data in the table, describe the distribution of the religious identification of the population in Nigeria. Explain a political consequence of this distribution.

(b) Using the data in the table and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about social cleavages in Nigeria.

(c) Explain how the state response to the distribution of religious identification in Nigeria differs from the state response to the distribution of religious identification in Iran.
